english.segment1: Thank God there's more to life than this (3x)This is where I'm from
english.segment2: Locked in a box. My patience is frozen. Bring back the feeling. My heart ice cold. I'm so numb to the pain (the pain). These darkers days. They last forever
english.segment3: This is where I'm from. I cant let myself become to cold. This is where I'm from. I cant let my environment change me
english.segment4: The weight of the world. In these long months. seems like it will never end. The sickness is spreading. I need to get away. You're always waiting for me to fall
english.segment5: This is where I'm from. I cant let myself become to cold. This is where I'm from. I cant let my environment change me
english.segment6: Thought you knew better. You thought you'd see us fall but now never. We're stronger than ever. We're gonna push right through this cold weather
english.segment7: You thought you knew us better. You thought you'd see us fall. We're stronger. We're gonna push right through this cold weather.
